propertyDescriptor.name: SLAContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: The path to the container holding SLA data. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'

propertyDescriptor.name: SLAAdminGroupName
propertyDescriptor.description: The SLA Admin group name, to be used for email notifications for SLA Purchase Order submission, updates, etc.

propertyDescriptor.name: SLAPurchaseOrderAdminContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: The container path to the container where purchase order data and access information is saved. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/SLA/Admin'.
